comment: Lemma for ~ minvec . The infimum of the distances to ` A ` is a real number. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.) (Revised by AV, 3-Oct-2020.)
